series_description: This series documents bacteriological and sanitary surveys of shellfish growing areas for their acceptability and safety in the harvesting of shellfish. The series may contain, but is not to: sanitary shoreline surveys, field inspection reports, correspondence, and condemned areas and evaluations.

This series documents the inspection of shellfish and crab dealers for compliance with sanitary standards, as well as the issuance or denial of a certificate of inspection. This series include, but is not limited to: certificates of inspection, floating permits, administrative hearings, plant inspections, and correspondence.
